inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longsword', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Bastard Sword', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greatsword', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Large Swords
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with longswords, bastard swords, and great swords.
